main event: A civilian observer reports seeing a single unidentified flying object over Rockingham, North Carolina on February 27, 1955.
interesting points: The object was initially circular in shape but appeared to float at a distance as it moved away.
The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes.
There were no photographs taken of the object.
The observer has not seen a similar object before, but another farmer in the area reported similar sightings.
The observer reported the sighting to the authorities on the day it occurred.
